Class Query

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.AbstractQuery
      pgrid.Query
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Query, ExactQueryInterface, QueryInterface
public class Query
extends AbstractQuery
implements ExactQueryInterface

This class represents a query message.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
@author Roman Schmidt

Parameters:
guid - the Query guid.
type - the type of Query.
query - the search string.
key - the key (binary represantion of the search string).
index - the search progress.
minSpeed - the mininum connection speed for responding host.
hops - the hop count.

getLowerBound

public String getLowerBound()
Description copied from interface: Query
Get the lower bound of the range query string that defines the query, e.g. a keyword such as 'Madonna' or a semantic query such as '<predicate>Actor</predicate><object>Madonna</object>'.

Specified by:
getLowerBound in interface Query
Returns:
the query string
See Also:
Query.getLowerBound()
